title: Ren and Stimpy: the classics
brief_description: These first-season classics transformed a scrawny, irritable chihuahua and his sweet but simple feline pal into rich, big-time cartoon celebrities: “Stimpy’s invention” - Stimpy invents a helmet for Ren that makes him happy. They sing the happy happy joy joy song and Ren smashes his helmet. Then he realizes that he is happy when he is mad. What else is in this show? - High Fashion Log for Girls, Dr. Stupid #3 “Untamed world” - Ren and Stimpy travel to the Galapagos Islands to discover a wide variety of marvellous creatures. “Space madness” - Commander Hoek and Cadet Stimpy are in space when Ren gets mad. Ren wants Stimpy to guard the mysterious History Erase Button. Video extra: Let Stimpy show you the way to get your day started right.
